content:
`Taboo.AI` has only one simple rule: **Talk to the AI and try to trick it into speaking out the 'Taboo' word shown on top of the screen.**

1. Select a category of words, or choose the **AI MODE** to give AI a topic and let AI generates the **TABOO** words for you! 2. Start your conversation with the AI and try to trick it into speaking out the **TABOO** word. 

 3. Complete all 10 words to see your scores and share with your friends!
